versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Organizes content into strategic publishing calendar

schema.prompt:
Create a strategic content publishing calendar from the available content:

Short Content: {{input.shortContent}}
Medium Content: {{input.mediumContent}}
Long Content: {{input.longContent}}
Visual Content: {{input.visualContent}}
Publishing Goals: {{input.publishingGoals}}
Target Audience: {{input.targetAudience}}

Develop comprehensive content calendar:

1. Content Distribution Strategy:
   - Platform prioritization
   - Content type allocation
   - Frequency planning
   - Audience timing
   - Engagement optimization

2. Publishing Schedule:
   - Daily content slots
   - Weekly themes
   - Monthly focus areas
   - Seasonal adaptations
   - Campaign alignment

3. Content Sequencing:
   - Logical progression
   - Story arcs
   - Educational journeys
   - Engagement building
   - Call-to-action timing

4. Platform-Specific Timing:
   - Optimal posting times
   - Platform algorithms
   - Audience activity patterns
   - Competitive analysis
   - Trend alignment

5. Cross-Promotion Strategy:
   - Content interconnections
   - Platform cross-posting
   - Audience migration
   - Engagement amplification
   - Viral potential

6. Content Spacing:
   - Avoid content fatigue
   - Maintain interest
   - Build anticipation
   - Allow engagement time
   - Prevent oversaturation

7. Engagement Hooks:
   - Question prompts
   - Discussion starters
   - Call-to-action placement
   - Interactive elements
   - Community building

8. Performance Tracking:
   - Success metrics
   - A/B testing schedule
   - Optimization points
   - Pivot opportunities
   - ROI measurement

9. Content Preparation:
   - Lead time requirements
   - Asset creation needs
   - Approval workflows
   - Backup content
   - Emergency adaptations

10. Team Coordination:
    - Role assignments
    - Deadline management
    - Review processes
    - Communication flows
    - Quality standards

Return as structured JSON with keys: contentCalendar (detailed schedule), publishingSchedule (dates and times), crossPromotionPlan (interconnections), engagementHooks (audience interaction), performanceTracking (metrics and goals), teamCoordination (workflow), contentKit (organized assets), optimizationNotes (improvement suggestions).

props.placeholder: Twitter posts, quick tips, quotes, etc.
What do you want to achieve? (engagement, leads, awareness)
Who are you trying to reach?

translations.description: Organizes repurposed content into strategic publishing calendar with cross-promotion
translations.instructions: Enter your various content formats. The system will create a strategic publishing calendar with optimal timing, cross-promotion, and engagement strategies.
translations.name: Calendar Organizer
